name: Special City Racing 2018
description: Welcome to the newest and unique Special City Racing 2018 game and enjoy the thrill ride across the city road tracks. This car racing game is perfect for real racing lovers, if you have a passion for car or for real adventures then it game gives you an opportunity to ride on high speed and perform some stunts. Special City Racing 2018 with combines excellent visuals, city racing in one of the best stunning games. Enjoy amusement drives with intense challenge. This car driving simulator game have more dangerous to enhancing driving experience and full package of entertainment.
